title: American teenagers ' belief in existence of a God
summary: A 2017 survey of American adults found that approximately 54 % of American Absolutely_certain_that_there_is_a_God and 7 % of American Not_sure_whether_or_not_there_is_a_God currently smoke existence .
Impact of Legalizing Cannabis in the American .
Since Washington and Colorado legalized recreational existence in 2012 , several more states have followed suit .
